title: Tech Down Ahead Of China Trade Talks — Tech Roundup
text:
The technology sector fell as traders hedged their bets on the outlook for U.S.-Chinese negotiations later in the week.

Match Group rose after analysts at brokerage Deutsche Bank said fears that its online dating sites were threatened by the entry of Facebook to the business were overstated.

Business-software maker SAP plans to start offering a partner company's artificial-intelligence software to help customers comply with data-privacy regulations, including the sweeping California law that takes effect in January.

Write to Rob Curran at rob.curran@dowjones.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 07, 2019 16:53 ET (20:53 GMT)
